project.name: MapComplete Healthcare
project.description: On this map, various healthcare related items are shown

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Healthcare has a layer doctors showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme Healthcare has a layer doctors showing features with this tag
The MapComplete theme Healthcare has a layer doctors showing features with this tag

The layer 'doctors allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'doctors allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'doctors allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'doctors allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'doctors' shows and asks freeform values for key 'opening_hours' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows and asks freeform values for key 'phone' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows contact:phone~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:phone}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows and asks freeform values for key 'email' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows contact:email~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:email}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows contact:website~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:website}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows and asks freeform values for key 'healthcare:speciality' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')

Layer 'doctors' shows healthcare:speciality=general with a fixed text, namely 'This is a general practitioner' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows healthcare:speciality=gynaecology with a fixed text, namely 'This is a gynaecologist' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows healthcare:speciality=psychiatry with a fixed text, namely 'This is a psychiatrist' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'doctors' shows healthcare:speciality=paediatrics with a fixed text, namely 'This is a paediatrician' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
The MapComplete theme Healthcare has a layer Hospital showing features with this tag

Layer 'Hospital' shows and asks freeform values for key 'phone' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'Hospital' shows contact:phone~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:phone}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')

Layer 'Hospital' shows contact:email~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:email}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'Hospital' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'Hospital' shows contact:website~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:website}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
The MapComplete theme Healthcare has a layer pharmacy showing features with this tag

The layer 'pharmacy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'pharmacy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'pharmacy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'pharmacy allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'pharmacy' shows and asks freeform values for key 'opening_hours' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'pharmacy' shows and asks freeform values for key 'phone' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'pharmacy' shows contact:phone~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:phone}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')

Layer 'pharmacy' shows contact:email~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:email}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'pharmacy' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
Layer 'pharmacy' shows contact:website~^..*$ with a fixed text, namely '{contact:website}' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')

Layer 'pharmacy' shows wheelchair=yes with a fixed text, namely 'This pharmacy is easy to access on a wheelchair' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')

Layer 'pharmacy' shows wheelchair=no with a fixed text, namely 'This pharmacy is hard to access on a wheelchair' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')

Layer 'pharmacy' shows wheelchair=limited with a fixed text, namely 'This pharmacy has limited access for wheelchair users' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Healthcare')
